articles.author: Janhoi McGregor
articles.title: Apple Will Have To ‘Rethink’ iPhone 16 Design After New Oregon Repair Law - Forbes
articles.description: Oregon's law goes further than other right-to-repair legislation in that it's the first to ban a practice called parts pairing.
